title: Values of States

definitions.Q*(s, a): sum T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')]
definitions.V*(s): max sum T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')]

formulas: Q*(s, a) = sum T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')]
V*(s) = max sum T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')]
summary: The slide presents the recursive definition of value, similar to expectimax, with formulas for V*(s) and Q*(s, a). It includes a diagram illustrating states, actions, and transitions.
